name: Robo Rampage
description:
Robo Rampage - A game by Sam and Nolan for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam.

IMPORTANT: There is a bug in the game that prevents you from winning after you have lost once! If you'd like to enjoy our winning sequence, reload the game after dying instead of using "R". ENJOY!

BEWARE THE ROBOT! A highly dangerous robot is highly OUT OF CONTROL in the laboratory! You must lead a group of soldiers to victory over this mean machine.

When your player dies, you take control of the next available soldier, indicated by the yellow arrow.

CONTROLS: 

WASD to move

Click to shoot

AUTHORS: 

Sam Mennega

Nolan Rinck
